introduction.known: 在这一课中，我们将学习谈论想要、学习和名字。
introduction.target: In this lesson, we will learn to talk about wanting, learning, and names.

S0053L01.target: She wants to help me now
She doesn't want to stop talking
She is thinking how to say something
She wanted to ask me something yesterday

S0053L01.known: 她期待和她的朋友说话
S0053L01.target: She is looking forward to speaking with her friend
